attr.title: Lunar Lux
attr.desc: Experience a sci-fi action-adventure RPG on the Moon in the year 30XX! Join Bella in a story of science, truth, justice, and trust, as she travels the silver globe to find a way to save humanity from Comet Coda! It's time to unleash your Lux!
attr.inst: Use `download_depot 1932680 1932681 4860005663388923912` with Steam Console to download the game and add the data to `lunarlux/assets`
